mapper.insert: insert ignore into id_generator(biz_tag, max_id, step, description, table_name, primary_key_column_name) values (#{bizTag}, #{maxId}, #{step}, #{description}, #{tableName}, #{primaryKeyColumnName})
mapper.update: insert into id_generator(biz_tag, max_id, step, description, table_name, primary_key_column_name) values (#{bizTag}, 1, #{step}, #{description}, #{tableName}, #{primaryKeyColumnName}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE max_id = max_id + step
mapper.select: select max_id from id_generator where biz_tag = #{bizTag} limit 1
